modName: Predator Vision - Arvak is Undead Fix
summary: Adds the "ActorTypeUndead"-Keyword to Arvak so when you use the "Predator Vision"-mod he doesnt glow like a mortal  anymore.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Description:[/b][/size]

The predator vision of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22274/]Predator Vision - Vampire Werewolf and Khajiit[/url]Â  by Gopher renders all mortal creatures yellowish. Unfortunately Arvak is missing a keyword that excludes all undead creatures like vampires and draugrs from this effect. But no more! I added that keyword so Arvak is truly undead now.
author: Alistair77
